attributes.action: immediately reduce all taxpayer funded salaries at all levels of government by 20% and to simultaneously reduce all taxpayer funded pension schemes for employees at all levels of government by 25%.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our fiscal position is unsustainable.  

To help address this problem, all taxpayer funded jobs at all levels of government should see an immediate 20% cut in pay and all taxpayer funded pensions should be reduced by 25%.

An environment where public sector employment compensation and pension benefits at any level of government are rising while private sector employment compensation and pension benefits are falling is unfair to taxpayers.
